verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rejoice, the Lord is King, Your Lord and King adore; Mortals, give thanks and sing And triumph evermore:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Lift up your heart, lift up your voice; Rejoice, again I say, rejoice.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: Jesus, the Savior reigns, The God of truth and love: When He had purged our stains He took His seat above:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: He sits at God’s right hand Till all His foes submit, And bow to His command, And fall beneath His feet:
